Hi all,

It’s been a while.

I have an eclectic group of 50+ FS/FT lots including over a dozen T206s.

Figured the best place to list is the Net54 T206 section.

Here’s a link to my collection home page including the FS/FT items:

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/157805670@N05/albums/[/url]

In terms of trade, I’m mainly looking to complete my T206 HOF subset & ‘72 Topps signed set.

PM if interested.

Thanks.

Scot Reader

Sent a pm for a couple lots
